name: Game A Week - S2C1-2018 - Theme for Project 2
name_original: Game A Week - S2C1-2018 - Theme for Project 2
description:
As part of the rapid prototyping class I am giving this semester, we'll be doing 5 games in the coming five weeks. This is the theme reveal game for Project 2 of week 2! Get with it!

How to Play

The game requires you to have a microphone to play. The android version requires your microphone/recording permissions. The android version may be a bit harder to play as well.

Aaar! You are a pirate captain and your ship is stranded in the high seas! Your enemies are coming at you from all sides and you must send them to a watery grave before they send you to Davy Jones' Locker!! Use yer inner pirate voice and pitch! A lower pitch bracket to rotate yer ship and a higher pitch bracket to fire! Destroy 10 enemies to win but if you get boarded by 3 ships then yer done for!!
